plot outline: Poshter Girl takes you on a mad roller coaster ride of a quaint, little village in Maharashtra - Tekawde, which is ill-famous for female infanticide and as a result there are no girls left within the village. When the question of boys' marriage is on heat, a beautiful and Intelligent girl enters the scenario and changes everything. This is the story of the girl Rupali and her chosen 5 candidates who would do anything to win her heart.
title: Poshter Girl
plot: _Poshter Girl_ (qv) takes you on a mad roller coaster ride of a quaint, little village in Maharashtra - Tekawde, which is ill-famous for female infanticide and as a result there are no girls left within the village. When the question of boys' marriage is on heat, a beautiful and Intelligent girl enters the scenario and changes everything. This is the story of the girl Rupali and her chosen 5 candidates who would do anything to win her heart.::Ashtapailu Infotech Pvt Ltd

Female infanticide is at large in Tekawde village since last 15 years that neighboring villages also fear to marry their daughters in Tekawde hence there are no females left in the village,Rupali a beautiful girl arrives in village and that's where every young men in village dreams of marrying her.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
